Auto tuning machine learning model parameters multi-objective optimisation Many parametric machine learning models e.g neural networks random forest many parameters need pre-fixed These parameters usually specified trial error In project use multi-objective optimisation approach get parameter values achieving multiple objectives simultaneously These multiple objectives minimising time maximising accuracy minimising overfitting minimising complexity These objectives typically conflicting nature therefore needs multi-objective optimisation method achieve them You use multi-objective optimisation approach different models different data sets You also validate resulting model unseen data Please refer following papers neuroevolution multi-objective optimisation  Stanley K.O Clune J Lehman J et al Designing neural networks neuroevolution Nat Mach Intell 1 24–35 (2019 https://doi.org/10.1038/s42256-018-0006-z  Emmerich M.T.M Deutz A.H A tutorial multiobjective optimization fundamentals evolutionary methods Nat Comput 17 585–609 (2018 https://doi.org/10.1007/s11047-018-9685-y

Robustness v.s Accuracy Adversarial Training Uncertainty This project aim develop Adversarial Training methods deep neural networks (DNNs based trade-off robustness accuracy via chance-constrained optimization uncertainty Recently researchers demonstrated DNNs quite vulnerable adversarial examples see video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XaQu7kkQBPc example slightly changing pixel feature input (such perturbation invisible human enable well-trained deep learning model produce incorrect decision And natural trade-off accuracy robustness means deep learning model absolutely robust useful practice absolutely accurate vulnerable adversarial perturbations This project aims develop adversarial training methods trade robustness accuracy optimization uncertainties The basic idea formulate adversarial training problem optimization problem input uncertainty The project develop adversarial training framework based chance-constrained optimization uncertainty methods train robust neural networks avoiding accuracy degradation clean samples Resource Available 4-GPU Workstation A close collaboration Ph.D student Essential requirement solid math background deep understanding optimization algorithms Python Matlab Preferable skills (or willingness learn various optimization uncertain techniques self-motivated learn new skills Reading Materials https://openai.com/blog/adversarial-example-research Understanding trade-off robustness accuracy https://engineering.purdue.edu/ChanGroup/ECE595/video.html (Part 4 Robust Machine Learning Other understandable links https://medium.com/@ml.at.berkeley/tricking-neural-networks-create-your-own-adversarial-examples-a61eb7620fd8 https://towardsdatascience.com/about-adversarial-examples-2a7a7b4d2670 https://towardsdatascience.com/breaking-neural-networks-with-adversarial-attacks-f4290a9a45aa https://www.eetimes.com/ai-tradeoff-accuracy-or-robustness A nice related tutorial https://adversarial-ml-tutorial.org/

Benchmarking Adversarial Robustness Transformers Deep learning shown remarkable performance many challenging tasks object recognition natural language processing game However recently researchers demonstrated deep learning-based systems quite vulnerable adversarial examples see video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XaQu7kkQBPc example slightly changing pixel feature input (the perturbation invisible human enable well-trained deep learning model produce incorrect decision Some researchers performed comprehensive benchmark adversarial robustness deep neural networks image classification tasks (see https://openaccess.thecvf.com/content_CVPR_2020/papers/Dong_Benchmarking_Adversarial_Robustness_on_Image_Classification_CVPR_2020_paper.pdf As newly-emerged deep learning model transformer demonstrated superior performance computer vision NLP tasks (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S27pHKBEp30 yet robustness adversarial perturbations fully explored This project aims establish
